sentences.en: Both surface and subsurface data could be used together.
sentences.cn: 还能使这两种资料配合使用.

sentences.en: Gas may play an important part in the accumulation of iodide in subsurface waters.
sentences.cn: 在地下水碘化物聚集过程中,气体可起重要作用.

sentences.en: Hydrologists are often interested in the solution of subsurface - flow problems.
sentences.cn: 水文工作者很关心地下水流问题的求解.

sentences.en: It is the purpose of this book to describe the elements of subsurface - flow theory.
sentences.cn: 本书的目的是描述地下水流理论的要点.

sentences.en: It is the responsibility of the subsurface stratigrapher to ferret out from these studies, or materials.
sentences.cn: 地下地层工作的责任在于把那些研究材料检索出来.

sentences.en: Perhaps this is caused by the sudden melting of subsurface permafrost.
sentences.cn: 可能是地下永久冻土突然融化所造成.

sentences.en: Subsurface temperature increases with burial depth might cause fluid expansion in most sedimentary basins.
sentences.cn: 在大多数沉积盆地中,地下温度随埋藏深度增高可能引起流体的膨胀.

sentences.en: Subsurface water applications usually permit additional simplification.
sentences.cn: 应用于地下水时,一般还允许进一步的简化.

sentences.en: The availability of similarity solutions to subsurface hydrologic problems is limited.
sentences.cn: 地下水文学问题相似求解的有效性是受到限制的.

sentences.en: The subsurface coverage is from 13 to a point halfway between 24 and the source.
sentences.cn: 地下覆盖段是从13道到24道至震源的中点.

sentences.en: They can be misidentified easily in the subsurface as fossil offshore bars.
sentences.cn: 它们在地下深处最易于与石化了的滨外沙洲混淆起来.

sentences.en: This form has also accumulated in the subsurface horizons of many soils in humid regions.
sentences.cn: 这种钙形态在湿润地区许多土壤的亚表层也有累积.

sentences.en: This is the important link for problems of subsurface flow.
sentences.cn: 这是解决地下水问题的重要一环.

sentences.en: This region can be considered to consist of surface atoms and subsurface atoms.
sentences.cn: 该区域可被看作为由表面原子和亚表面的原子所组成.

sentences.en: This study is concerned essentially with subsurface water.
sentences.cn: 这里的研究主要针对地下水.

words.tran_cn: 地下的；隐匿的（等于 subterranean）

phrases.tran_cn: 地下水；底土水；次表层水
